mapper.update: update edu_course SET name = #{name}, isavaliable = #{isavaliable}, is_pay = #{isPay}, sourceprice = #{sourceprice}, currentprice = #{currentprice}, title = #{title}, context = #{context}, lessionnum = #{lessionnum}, coursetag = #{coursetag}, logo = #{logo}, mobile_logo = #{mobileLogo}, update_time = #{updateTime}, losetype = #{losetype}, lose_abs_time = #{loseAbsTime}, lose_time = #{loseTime}, updateuser = #{updateuser}, page_buycount = #{pageBuycount}, page_viewcount = #{pageViewcount}, freeurl = #{freeurl}, sell_type=#{sellType}, live_begin_time = #{liveBeginTime}, live_end_time = #{liveEndTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select
from edu_course where id = #{value}

select edu_course.id, edu_course.name, edu_course.logo from edu_course where ISAVALIABLE=0 and edu_course.sell_type!='LIVE' and id in (SELECT ct.course_id from edu_course_teacher as ct WHERE ct.teacher_id=#{value}) order by edu_course.update_time DESC limit 0,3

select
from edu_course
edu_course.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
AND edu_course.sell_type!='LIVE'
AND edu_course.sell_type=#{sellType}

SELECT
FROM edu_course LEFT JOIN edu_course_profile ON edu_course.`id` = edu_course_profile.`id` ORDER BY edu_course_profile.`viewcount` DESC LIMIT 5

select DISTINCT edu_course.id, edu_course.name, edu_course.isavaliable, edu_course.addtime, edu_course.is_pay, edu_course.sourceprice, edu_course.currentprice, edu_course.title, edu_course.lessionnum, edu_course.coursetag, edu_course.logo, edu_course.mobile_logo, edu_course.update_time, edu_course.losetype, edu_course.lose_abs_time, edu_course.lose_time, edu_course.updateuser, edu_course.page_buycount, edu_course.page_viewcount, edu_course.freeurl, edu_course.sell_type, edu_course.live_begin_time, edu_course.live_end_time, sys_subject.SUBJECT_NAME, IFNULL(edu_course_profile.buycount,0) buycount, IFNULL(edu_course_profile.viewcount,0) viewcount, IFNULL(edu_course_profile.commentcount,0) commentcount, IFNULL(edu_course_profile.questiongcount,0) questiongcount, IFNULL(edu_course_profile.notecount,0) notecount, IFNULL(edu_course_profile.playcount,0) playcount from edu_course left join edu_course_subject on edu_course.id=edu_course_subject.course_id left join sys_subject on edu_course_subject.SUBJECT_ID=sys_subject.SUBJECT_ID left join edu_course_profile on edu_course.id=edu_course_profile.course_Id left join edu_course_teacher on edu_course.id = edu_course_teacher.course_id
and edu_course.id in (select cm.course_id from edu_course_member as cm where cm.memberType_id = #{e.membertype})
and edu_course_teacher.teacher_id = #{e.teacherId}
and edu_course.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{e.name},'%')
and edu_course.id = #{e.id}
AND (edu_course_subject.subject_id=#{e.subjectId} or sys_subject.parent_id=#{e.subjectId})
AND edu_course.sell_type!='LIVE'
AND edu_course.sell_type=#{e.sellType}
AND edu_course.isavaliable=#{e.isavaliable}
and edu_course.is_pay = #{e.isPay}
AND edu_course.live_begin_time>now()
AND edu_course.live_begin_time<now() and edu_course.live_end_time>now()
AND edu_course.live_end_time<now()
order by edu_course_profile.viewcount desc
order by edu_course.addTime desc
order by edu_course.currentPrice asc
order by edu_course.live_begin_time desc
select edu_course.id, edu_course.name, edu_course.logo from edu_course ISAVALIABLE=0 and edu_course.sell_type!='LIVE' order by edu_course.id desc limit #{num}

FROM edu_course LEFT JOIN edu_course_profile ON edu_course.id=edu_course_profile.course_id WHERE 1=1
AND edu_course.sell_type!='LIVE'
AND edu_course.sell_type=#{sellType}
and edu_course.id in
#{item}
order by edu_course.id desc

SELECT DISTINCT edu_course.id, edu_course.name, edu_course.isavaliable, edu_course.addtime, edu_course.is_pay, edu_course.sourceprice, edu_course.currentprice, edu_course.title, edu_course.lessionnum, edu_course.coursetag, edu_course.logo, edu_course.mobile_logo, edu_course.update_time, edu_course.losetype, edu_course.lose_abs_time, edu_course.lose_time, edu_course.updateuser, edu_course.page_buycount, edu_course.page_viewcount, edu_course.freeurl, edu_course.sell_type FROM edu_course WHERE edu_course.currentprice=0 and edu_course.sell_type!='LIVE' limit #{num}

select edu_course.id, edu_course.currentprice from edu_course left join edu_course_subject on edu_course.id=edu_course_subject.course_id left join sys_subject on edu_course_subject.SUBJECT_ID=sys_subject.SUBJECT_ID where edu_course.id in (${courseIds}) and (edu_course_subject.subject_id=#{subjectId} or sys_subject.parent_id=#{subjectId})

SELECT EDU_COURSE.ID AS COURSE_ID, EDU_COURSE.NAME, EDU_COURSE.TITLE, EDU_COURSE.LOGO, EDU_COURSE.mobile_LOGO FROM EDU_COURSE LEFT JOIN EDU_COURSE_SUBJECT ON EDU_COURSE_SUBJECT.COURSE_ID = EDU_COURSE.ID WHERE ISAVALIABLE=0 and edu_course.sell_type!='LIVE'
AND EDU_COURSE_SUBJECT.SUBJECT_ID=#{e.subjectId}
AND EDU_COURSE.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{e.courseName},'%')
ORDER BY EDU_COURSE.ADDTIME DESC
ORDER BY EDU_COURSE.ADDTIME ASC
